The Challenge of Making Friends as an Adult(2012)

stories.text:
I'm extremely excited to announce that my latest project - BotMeNot - is finally live in the beta version!

After spending so much time on the development and promotion it's finally here! It's very difficult for me to hold in my excitement!

If you're interested, check out - https://gui.botmenot.com/registration and let me know what you think!

What I've prepared for the beta testers is a gift of 100 free credits to run any type of test you desire. Currently, there are three types - Starter, Light, and Smart!

Also, if you have any questions - feel free to ask!
stories.title: Launched BotMeNot Beta – Looking for Beta Users
